about_the_game:
Gift code:
vip666
vip888

Customer service QQ: 1595584560
Contact customer service to receive the game gift package (Note: Flame Showdown)

【Yanglong Temple】
Complete various tasks, collect dragon raising points to improve the dragon raising level, and obtain special rewards while also improving your ability to suppress other players.

【Forbidden Land Boss】
All players in the server will kill the boss together, and in addition to receiving kill rewards, auction props will also be dropped, and the bidding proceeds will be divided among the players who participated in the boss challenge.

【Treasure Box from Heaven】
During the event, various treasure boxes will appear randomly on the map, and players can obtain a large number of rare props by opening the treasure boxes.

【Champions of Kings】
Players usually challenge other players to advance in rank and qualify for the final challenge. In the final battle, they can win the championship by defeating other players one by one.

【Bravely enter the gate of heaven】
During the event, you will gain points by defeating monsters and players. If the points meet the requirements, you can advance to the next level. In the final level, players will jointly kill the boss and receive high rewards.

【Siege Guangmingding】
Every week, gang members can occupy various cities on the big map and receive rewards. At the weekend, they will unlock the right to challenge the central city, and people from different gangs can compete for the martial arts leader.

【Yanglong Temple】
Complete various tasks, collect dragon raising points to improve the dragon raising level, and obtain special rewards while also improving your ability to suppress other players.

【Forbidden Land Boss】
All players in the server will kill the boss together, and in addition to receiving kill rewards, auction props will also be dropped, and the bidding proceeds will be divided among the players who participated in the boss challenge.

【Treasure Box from Heaven】
During the event, various treasure boxes will appear randomly on the map, and players can obtain a large number of rare props by opening the treasure boxes.

【Champions of Kings】
Players usually challenge other players to advance in rank and qualify for the final challenge. In the final battle, they can win the championship by defeating other players one by one.

【Bravely enter the gate of heaven】
During the event, you will gain points by defeating monsters and players. If the points meet the requirements, you can advance to the next level. In the final level, players will jointly kill the boss and receive high rewards.

【Siege Guangmingding】
Every week, gang members can occupy various cities on the big map and receive rewards. At the weekend, they will unlock the right to challenge the central city, and people from different gangs can compete for the martial arts leader.
name: 烈焰对决-经典归来

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 or Radeon RX Vega 8
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: "Fire Showdown" is a classic ARPG game with a retro style. The game can bring players exquisite graphics experience, hearty combat experience and rich and spectacular game experience.
